entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 8.
